import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Start VM Image Scan</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/api/v31.02/vms/scan"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"monitorHosts","saas":true,"self-hosted":true}
x-public: true
```



Re-scans all VM images immediately. This endpoint returns the time that the scans were initiated.

### cURL Request

Refer to the following example cURL command that forces Prisma Cloud to re-scan all VM images:

```bash
$ curl -k \
  -u <USER> \
  H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -X POST \
  "https://<CONSOLE>/api/v<VERSION>/vms/scan"
```


<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

OK

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"default"} value={"default"}><div></div><div></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
